mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Norton, George W. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Norton, George W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 9 1863. By Telegraph from Grafton 9 1863. Our Regiments are en route for Fairmont. If guns are shipped shall I send them back to Wheeling. Answer at Fairmont Geo W Norton 29W.55col.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Norton, George W.
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
